title: What is the risk of social exclusion for disabled people in the EU?
subtitle: In 2024, 28.7% of disabled people in the EU were at risk of poverty or social exclusion, compared to 17.9% of non-disabled people. The figure stood at 30.4 in 2016.
textNote: This dataset only includes people aged 16 years or older with some or severe activity limitation. The data for Luxembourg is from 2022.
